3.10.0.0.message: Fixed an issue where a duplicate `protocols` field was accidentally added to the `pre-function` schema.

3.3.0.0.message: `kong.cache` now points to a cache instance that is dedicated to the Serverless Functions plugins. It does not provide access to the global Kong Gateway cache. Access to certain fields in `kong.conf` has also been restricted.[#10417](https://github.com/Kong/kong/pull/10417)

3.1.0.0.message: Added the missing `protocols` field to the following plugin schemas: Serverless pre-function (`pre-function`)

3.0.0.0.message: Updated the priority for some plugins.: `pre-function` changed from `+inf` to `1000000`

Removed the deprecated `config.functions` configuration parameter from the Serverless Functions pluginsâ€™ schemas. Use the `config.access` phase instead.[#8559](https://github.com/Kong/kong/pull/8559)
Fixed a problem that could cause a crash.[#9269](https://github.com/Kong/kong/pull/9269)

2.8.4.0.message: Added the missing `protocols` field to the following plugin schemas: Serverless pre-function (`pre-function`)
